Capture, Download, and Share Your Screen with Ease
Introducing the ultimate screen capture solution for Chrome users! Our powerful Chrome extension is designed to help you capture your entire screen, specific tabs, or application windows effortlessly. Whether you're a professional, educator, or everyday user, our extension simplifies screen capturing, saving, and sharing.

Key Features:
Versatile Capture Options:

Entire Screen: Capture everything on your screen with a single click.
Specific Tabs: Select and capture individual browser tabs for focused content.
Application Windows: Capture specific application windows to highlight your workflow.
Easy Download:

Save your captures directly to your computer in high-quality formats.
Choose between popular image formats like PNG and JPEG.
For video captures, save in the widely compatible WEBM format.
Seamless Upload and Share:

Upload to Server: Instantly upload your captures to our secure server.
Sharable Link: Get a shareable link to your uploaded captures, making it easy to share with colleagues, friends, or on social media.
Privacy and Security: Rest assured that your uploads are stored securely with robust privacy measures.
Convert to MP4:

Convert your video captures from WEBM to MP4 for broader compatibility and easier sharing.
Use our built-in conversion tool to ensure your videos can be viewed on any device or platform.
User-Friendly Interface:

Intuitive Design: Our extension is designed with simplicity in mind, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Quick Access: Easily access capture options from the extension icon in your browser toolbar.
Real-Time Preview: Preview your captures before saving or uploading to ensure accuracy.
Enhanced Productivity:

Annotations and Markers: Add annotations, highlights, and markers to your captures for clearer communication.
Clipboard Support: Quickly copy captures to your clipboard for immediate use in documents and presentations.
Customizable Settings: Adjust capture settings to fit your specific needs, including resolution and format options.
Integration and Compatibility:

Cloud Integration: Option to save captures directly to popular cloud storage services.
Cross-Platform Support: Works seamlessly on Windows, macOS, and Linux.
Browser Compatibility: Fully compatible with the latest versions of Chrome.
Support and Updates:

Regular Updates: We continuously improve our extension with new features and enhancements.
Dedicated Support: Our support team is always ready to assist you with any questions or issues.
Why Choose Our Extension?
Efficiency: Streamline your workflow with quick and easy screen captures.
Flexibility: Capture, save, and share your screen in multiple ways.
Reliability: Trust our secure server and robust features to handle your screen captures.
How It Works:
Install the Extension: Add our extension to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Select Capture Mode: Choose to capture your entire screen, a specific tab, or a window.
Capture and Save: Capture the screen and save it directly to your computer or upload it to our server.
Share or Convert: Get a shareable link for your upload or convert your video to MP4 format.
